name: Cursed Tales (Chapter 1 Demo)
description:
Currently not working on mobileThe first chapter (1of4) of the game I'm working on.
  • Gone through lots of testing but if you spot a bug please do let me know! I am looking to better myself and to implement new approaches in the following chapters of this game.
No screenshots = NO SPOILERS
  • This is my first RPG Maker project and I'm still at the very beginning of my learning journey.  Some things (such as cover image, background music etc.) are in no way finalized yet!
  • Lastly this wouldn't have been possible without the help of the awesome RMMV community, so : thank you!

⌁Lozza⌁
